#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
vector<int>adj[1000006];
vector<int>adj1[1000006];
int main(){
    int t,n,m,a,b,f,ans;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--){
        cin>>n>>m;
        for(int i=0;i<=n;i++){
            adj[i].clear();
            adj1[i].clear();
        }
        f=0;
        for(int i=0;i<m;i++){
            cin>>a>>b;
            adj[a].push_back(b);
            adj1[b].push_back(a);
        }
        for(int i=1;i<=n;i++){
            if(adj[i].size()==n-i&&adj1[i].size()==0){
                f=1;ans=i;break;
            }
        }
        if(f==1){
            cout<<2<<" "<<ans<<endl;
        }
        else cout<<1<<endl;
    }
}
